word.kjv: And when they had gone through the isle unto Paphos, they found a certain sorcerer, a false prophet, a Jew, whose name was Bar-jesus:
word.thailand: เมื่อได้เดินตลอดเกาะนั้นไปถึงเมืองปาโฟสแล้ว ก็ได้พบคนหนึ่งเป็นคนทำเวทมนตร์ เป็นผู้ทำนายเท็จ เป็นพวกยิวชื่อว่าบารเยซู
word.spanish1909: Y habiendo atravesado toda la isla hasta Papho, hallaron un hombre mago, falso profeta, Judío, llamado Bar jesús;
word.latinvulgate: Et cum perambulassent universam insulam usque Paphum, invenerunt quemdam virum magnum pseudoprophetam, Judæum, cui nomen erat Barjesu,
word.italian1927: Poi, traversata tutta l’isola fino a Pafo, trovarono un certo mago, un falso profeta giudeo, che avea nome Bar-Gesù,
word.german1912: Und da sie die Insel durchzogen bis zu der Stadt Paphos, fanden sie einen Zauberer und falschen Propheten, einen Juden, der hieß Bar-Jesus;
word.french1910: Ayant ensuite traversé toute l'île jusqu'à Paphos, ils trouvèrent un certain magicien, faux prophète juif, nommé Bar-Jésus,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們走遍全島，到了帕弗，遇見一個猶太人，名叫巴．耶穌，是個術士，又是個假先知。
word.korean: 온 섬 가운데로 지나서 바보에 이르러 바예수라 하는 유대인 거짓 선지자 박수를 만나니
word.tagalog: At nang kanilang matahak na ang buong pulo hanggang sa Pafos, ay nakasumpong sila ng isang manggagaway, bulaang propeta, Judio, na ang kaniyang pangalan ay Bar-Jesus;
word.maori: A, no to ratou putanga i te motu katoa ki Papaho, ka kitea tetahi tangata makutu, he poropiti teka, he Hurai, ko Paraihu te ingoa:
word.cebuano: Ug sa nalatas na nila ang tibook nga pulo hangtud sa Papho, hingkaplagan nila ang usa ka salamangkero nga Judio, manalagna nga bakakon, nga ginganlan si Barjesus;
word.hebrewmodern: ויעברו בכל האי עד פפוס וימצאו איש מגוש אחד נביא שקר איש יהודי ושמו בר ישוע׃
word.textusreceptus: διελθοντες δε την νησον αχρι παφου ευρον τινα μαγον ψευδοπροφητην ιουδαιον ω ονομα βαριησους
